info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-cp-svl-oper
info.description:
A collection of YANG definitions for switch control path
     StackWise Virtual operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2020, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Interfaces & Layer 2
**Paths:** 9

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-cp-svl-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-cp-svl-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-cp-svl-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-switch-cp-svl-oper.html)

is-control-port.description: Port is control port of this link
